en: Before Jesus began his public ministry, a prophet appeared in the desert.
He called the people to prepare themselves.

lines: In those days John the Baptist came,
preaching in the Desert of Judea and saying,
“Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is near.”
This is he who was spoken of through the prophet Isaiah:
“A voice of one calling in the desert,
The next day John saw Jesus coming toward him and said,
who takes away the sin of the world!”
Jesus went and lived in a town called Nazareth.
He grew in wisdom and stature,
and in favor with God and men.
Now Jesus himself was about thirty years old

question.en: What do you notice about how John describes Jesus—and how this moment connects with what the prophets said earlier?
